subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Just 11 months after his second P.G.A. Tour victory in the span of a month, Justin Rose, 30, is something of an afterthought at the 2011 U.S. Open that begins Thursday.
snippet: Just 11 months after his second P.G.A. Tour victory in the span of a month, Justin Rose, 30, is something of an afterthought at the 2011 U.S. Open that begins Thursday.
